entry.title: 0.9.0rc3 tagged
entry.summary: Binaries for the Bitcoin 0.9.0rc3 version are now available on the official website. The community is urged to participate in sanity testing to ensure that the release is stable and free of bugs. Additionally, more 'gitian builders' are needed for the final 0.9.0 release as only two builders, Wladimir and the author, have built the rc3 binaries so far. Those running Linux or OSX are encouraged to contribute by building dependencies on their virtual machines.
